thought: To craft cyan_terracotta, I need to first craft cyan_dye. To craft cyan_dye, I need to place a blue dye and a green dye side by side in the crafting table. I have a green dye in slot 41, but no blue dye. Therefore, I will craft a blue dye by moving the cornflower in slot 28 into the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok

thought: To craft cyan terracotta I need to place 8 terracotta blocks in a square around a cyan dye. I have 8 terracotta blocks in slot 34 and 2 cyan dye in slot 12. First I need to move one terracotta block into the crafting grid. I will place it in slot 1 because that is the top left corner of the crafting grid and it is easier to build a square starting from the top left corner.
Ok
